page.title: 03Local Events
page.content: { {1.Maghull and District Round Table} hold various annual events, especially the November Bonfire Display, the Christmas Float and the Summer Carnival. The latter is held on Whinney Brook Field in July. There are displays, competitions, sidestalls,morris dancers and a fun fair. . {2.Historic Vehicles Rally}was held by St James Church to raise money.Vintage and classic cars,steam engines and motor cycles were on display. {3.Maghull and District Horticultural {Society}hold a show every year. {4.Maghull and District Sports Council} held a Sports Festival in June.Events included football,netball,judo,darts snooker,tennis,cricket,athletics, and a tug_of _war competition.There was also a 7 mile fun run.
